get_files[source]

get_files(path, extensions=None, recurse=True, folders=None, followlinks=True)

Get all the files in path with optional extensions, optionally with recurse, only in folders, if specified.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_audio_files[source]

get_audio_files(path, recurse=True, folders=None)

Get audio files in path recursively, only in folders, if specified.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_txt_files[source]

get_txt_files(path, recurse=True, folders=None)

Get text files in path recursively, only in folders, if specified.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path = Path('../test')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
audio_extensions = tuple(str.lower(k) for k, v in mimetypes.types_map.items() if v.startswith('audio/'))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(len(get_audio_files(path, folders=['test'])),2) 
test_eq(len(get_audio_files(path, folders=['test'])),
        len(get_audio_files(path, folders=['audio'])))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(len(get_audio_files(path, folders=['test','audio'])),
        len(get_txt_files  (path, folders=['test','txt'])))
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

words_count[source]

words_count(files, sort=True, drop_punkt=True)

Return a dict of words in files with counts, sorted by default

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

label_func[source]

label_func(fname)

Return path to audio file corresponding to text fname

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(label_func(path/'test/txt/197.txt'), path/'test/audio/197.flac')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

ReadTxt[source]

ReadTxt(fn)

Read text from fn

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(ReadTxt(path/'txt/14.txt'),'под ним войска ва+шингтона побеждают во многих революционных битвах.')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

word_in_files[source]

word_in_files(word, files, show=False, play=False)

Return an L list of files where word is present; optionally show and/or play

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

regex_files[source]

regex_files(regexp, files, show=False, play=False)

Return an L list of text files where regular expression regexp is found. Optionally show text and/or play corresponding audio.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

accent_files[source]

accent_files(files=None, show=False, play=False)

Create a function that returns a L list of files where accent is marked with + in any word.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
af = accent_files(show=True)
af([path/'txt/14.txt'])

под ним войска ва+шингтона побеждают во многих революционных битвах.
../test/txt/14.txt

(#1) [Path('../test/txt/14.txt')]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

abbrev_files[source]

abbrev_files(files=None, show=False, play=False)

Create a function that returns a L list of files where abbreviated word is wrapped in *

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

unusual_files[source]

unusual_files(files=None, show=False, play=False)

Create a function that returns a L list of files where unusually pronounsed word is wrapped in _

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
unf = unusual_files(show=True)
unf(path/'txt/197.txt')

статуя начала ассоциироваться с потоком иммигрантов лишь в тысяча девятьсот третьем году, когда знаменитый _сонет_ эммы лазарус «новый коло+сс» был выгравирован в основании статуи.
../test/txt/197.txt

(#1) [Path('../test/txt/197.txt')]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

plot_durations[source]

plot_durations(files, figsize=None, title:str='Dataset Clip Duration Distribution')

Plot audio files duration distribution

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

drop_outliers[source]

drop_outliers(files, mindur=None, maxdur=None)

Return only those files with duration in (mindur,maxdur), drop outliers.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

create_filelist[source]

create_filelist(filelist:Path, idxs:L, files:L)

Create a file with audio filelist from idxs of files and copy audio files with new names into target_audios_path.

Example: audio/EHD_120768D_206.flac|это демонстрирует его отношение к рабству. audio/EHD_120770D_068.flac|а в «юнион пасифик» их не трогали.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

create_mel_filelist[source]

create_mel_filelist(filelist:Path, idxs:L, files:L)

Creates a mel_duration_pitch filelist from idxs of files.

Example: mels/EHD_120768D_206.pt|durations/EHD_120768D_206.pt|pitch_char/EHD_120768D_206.pt|это демонстрирует его отношение к рабству. mels/EHD_120770D_068.pt|durations/EHD_120768D_206.pt|pitch_char/EHD_120768D_206.pt|а в «юнион пасифик» их не трогали.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
